title: Alex Vando Mens Button Down Shirts Wrinkle Free 4-Way Stretch Print Business Casual Shirt
description: Fabric: The Mens dress shirt is made from High quality 97%Polyester 3%Spandex prints, wrinkle-free, smooth hand feel, four-way stretchy fabric provides a comfortable and versatile shirt for long periods.
Design: The button down shirt features a sophisticated printed design in several colors and styles, adding a touch of style to the classic business dress shirt.

Size: Based on US regular fit sizing, fits true to size, The different pattern is allowing you to choose the one that suits your personal style. Four-way stretch feature for greater flexibility and range of motion.
Versatility: The shirt can be dressed up for formal occasions or dressed down for casual events, making it a versatile addition to any wardrobe.
Durability: The dress shirt for men is made with high-quality materials and construction, as well as wrinkle-free property for easy care and maintenance.
